name: @pdv/sqlite-gen

scripts.gen: npx tsx sqlite-gen.ts tests/queries.sql tests/node/queries.gen.ts node
scripts.gen:d1: npx tsx sqlite-gen.ts tests/queries.sql tests/d1/queries.gen.d1.ts d1
scripts.test: npm run gen && npm run gen:d1 && wrangler types tests/d1/worker-configuration.d.ts && tsc --noEmit && npx tsx tests/node/node.test.ts && npx vitest run tests/d1/d1.test.ts

author: pdv
description: Generate Typescript from SQL for node:sqlite or Cloudflare D1
